nodes.bodyText: Why serial runner, is there a reason why these tests can't be run in parallel?
yes, they are creating some files on runtime with the same name so they should be run serially
Bit weird for the tearDown() method to be annotated with @Before... Mistake?
it should clear out the system property if present, so we also run this method before each run.
Name is quite a mouthful, maybe something shorter?
Maybe at least leave out the second Config, like YamlJetConfigBuilderResolutionTest? Or even YamlJetConfigResolutionTest? Not sure.
Same question, can't you run them in parallel?
